website_summaries.verdict: Wooden plyometric box with superior construction and craftsmanship and a stable, supportive design.
pros: T-shaped skeleton reinforces all sides of the box
Edges and corners are sanded to prevent splinters and injuries
Available in four sizes, some of which also come in foam varieties
cons: You’ll need to assemble the box yourself, and some consumers report broken or missing pieces

customer_reviews.title: Passed the fitness test thanks to this
customer_reviews.text: Easier to assemble than the Avengers and helped me pass the first physical fitness test for the border patrol. Same brand you can often see in gyms. Good product. Low price. P. S. I weighed 260lbs training on this. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Devin Hall

customer_reviews.title: NOT sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so surprised by all the good reviews. This was def easy to put together and is a really nice box but it’s so light weight that it’s very unstable to step up on, especially with weights. We had to take it apart and send it back. Super bummed cause we really wanted it to be everything the reviews say it is. But our opinion is don’t waste your time on this.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliehoke

customer_reviews.title: I have been looking for one of these!
customer_reviews.text: Great little plyo box. It’s made of premium wood, with very smooth edges. It is multi height capable 12”, 14”, and 16”. Just what I need for indoor step ups. I use it as a deep squat exercise base. It works well, and is very sturdy. I can easily see taking this outdoors to get in some exercises while out and about. Great product. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Leftside HeavyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great Box with One Caveat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this box once assembled. It looks great, has a nice finish, and is very sturdy; it's a good design. Assembly should take only about 10 minutes. The one problem I had was that the cutouts on the box were ever so slightly too small in several areas to permit assembly. This where the wooden tabs go into the slots. I took a file to the openings and just removed a tiny amount from the opening until I could press the tab in. Since it is plywood, too much force might cause it to crack or delaminate; in my case, they wouldn't fit. Now that it is together, it is a great box!
customer_reviews.author: SheppardVelo

customer_reviews.title: It's not flimsy!
customer_reviews.text: First let me see that I thought there were three boxes. Instead, one box with three different , height, length and widths. Instructions were good quality excellent and once assembled I am proud to say that it was well worth the money. Would highly recommend that if you are looking 4 a box to jump on jump over or step upon this is well worth the money to purchase. PS hey one box takes up whole lot less room 3!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kim Santos

customer_reviews.title: Extra screws. Uh oh.
customer_reviews.text: Why don’t they include instructions? I am not a puzzle player nor do I do well with IKEA products. Things should come assembled or make sure that anybody can assemble them. I had to drill my own holes in a couple places but at the end of the day still ended up with six extra screws. That is rarely a good thing if those screws should have gone somewhere and now the box is not at full strength? Hoping this thing doesn’t fall apart as I bought it to support my weight when exercising. Next time spend the extra few pennies by putting in instructions. Or link to a step by step instruction video. We are not all carpenters.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Pieces don't match.
customer_reviews.text: I got this plyometrics box hoping to start doing the part of my current routine where I need to do box jumps and as I was assembling it, the top piece would not fit. After discovering this, I took it apart and redid it and it still doesn't fit. Also, when I first tried putting the screws in, about 4 different areas where there should have been visible holes were not there. I wish they would have just put a damn number on each piece so I didn't have to waste almost an hour of my time struggling with something that should easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: No screws...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this box... the last piece of equipment I wanted to complete my little pandemic garage gym. I opened the packaging, got the parts laid out... was looking for the little white box that had the screws and much to my surprise - NO SCREWS. The box was there crushed under all the other "stuff" but no screws. So I repacked it all and sent it all back. Apparently I am not the only one that has had problems as of late with not getting the screws. Oh well. I ordered a competitors product and it works great (oh and it came with the screws).
customer_reviews.author: Native Texan

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity is the key
customer_reviews.text: This box does exactly what it's supposed to do. It comes packed tightly. Is easy to unpack and assemble. Instructions are clear and all the its and pieces are in the box. It has internal bracing that fits tightly and doesn't rattle when using or moving the box. Traction on the wood is good for athletic shoes, although I can see adding grip tape for more aggressive use. The tallest side is a little less stable than I would like, but haven't had a problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: A N

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: So it is what we were expecting. It's nice looking, sturdy and easy to build. However, one of the screws was damaged and there were no extras. I tried to leave a "less critical" hole unscrewed but would feel better if I was sent that missing screw.
customer_reviews.author: Gena R

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I chose the medium sized box, 20" X 18" X 16", with black non-skid surface. That give me several reasonable options for either box jumps or step-ups. Assembly was very easy and took me about 10 minutes. Most of the screws used a provided allen wrench. Three screws for the inside cross-support require a phillips head screw driver. I also used wood glue on the joints, but don't believe it was necessary. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Avocat

customer_reviews.title: Great box! Very impressed. Small fault but doesn’t effect the use.
customer_reviews.text: Great box! Very impressed. Only reason I don’t give it a 5 star is because of the faulty 16 in stamps don’t match in the right direction. I took this thing apart and put back together a dozen times and it didn’t matter which way it was put together , the 16in sides point opposite direction from each other. The box hold up well though!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good box!
customer_reviews.text: The box is standing up well to all the use it is gettin! One things THERE WERE NO INSTRUCTIONS!! For some this would’ve been very difficult, my husband and I got it put together in about 30-45 min (maybe less). The screw I am pointing to in the picture will not go in, and refuses to screw. We will most likely have to get an electric drill and put some pressure on it. The box is very sturdy, we do box jumps, step ups, and even some squat sit downs on it :) for the price it’s al good :)
customer_reviews.author: DawnCA

customer_reviews.title: You need sturdy - this is sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I was intimidated by the size of the box when delivered and didn't put it together for about a month. One day I just decided to open the box and put it together. It took maybe 20 minutes. All the pieces fit as they should, the screws went into the holes as the should. I have used the box for box jumps and I feel comfortable jumping on it without feeling like I will fall. Great box for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for CBP test
customer_reviews.text: Very high step. It does double as a great step ladder, or a low bench seat. I bought it to practice for the CBP test, when I found out that they can use the polygraph test responses against you in a current federal position that you may already be in I dropped out of the process. I'm not putting my current job in jeopardy. This is a cheap and sturdy option for that test though. Assembly was a breeze, tedious with all the screws, but easy.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have used boxes in the past, ordering I was skeptical however, receiving this was fast and assembly took 10 minutes! It's perfect! I use it for chest press, step ups, explosive jump ups and a ton more. Yes it's pint size but it's a size that fits me and still wide enough to do anything a large one can provide as far as space and three sides have different heights so there's such a variation you can use it for! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Enough but for how long - Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped with a couple of bent/unusable screws, contacted customer service immediately but they never replied. Assembled it the best I could. I know it doesn't seem like a big deal at first, but it's a plyo box- it's going to have to take a beating. I doubt it'll hold up as well it's designed to, I'll make sure to update.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for box jumping during workouts
customer_reviews.text: I use this during my workouts for box jumping. It was fairly easy to assemble but it did come with missing 1 screw. Not a huge deal to me though since I ended up finding a replacement screw. You definitely need to use it on a sturdy flooring like concrete, hardwood, vinyl, etc other than carpet. Carpet is not sturdy enough as a flooring to keep the box from moving around. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts but appears it could be nice
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great product, but the package arrived with excessive tape on it like it had been previously opened and only contained 4 panels. You can’t make a box with only 4 sides. I’ll update this review when the replacement arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Keough

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: We got this so that my son could continue to work out while waiting for athletics to resume at school. He started at 24” and is now up to 30”. This has really strengthened his legs. Even my daughter is using it now. So this was a really good investment. Very easy to assemble and it’s sturdy. I highly recommend using a mat underneath it if you are on a smooth surface because it will slide.
customer_reviews.author: Tatum Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, comes with everything plus 1
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to assemble, comes with everything including 1 extra of each type of screw (2 types). Sturdy, internal supports. Looks nice. Used it right away. Perfect for a variety of heights and uses. Very happy. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Julie & Brady

customer_reviews.title: Return Policy
customer_reviews.text: I need to return this because we are not happy with the product. My order information shows my return window is closed, but this was the information on the item when I purchased it. 1 YEAR WARRANTY – 60 DAY RETURN – PLACE YOUR ORDER NOW: Make Yes4All Wood Plyo Box as your loyal friend for every workout. Add it to cart now, or if you don’t like it, contact us and have money back within 60 days of purchase This was a birthday present that I purchased several weeks before it was even opened. Can you help me to return it?
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Super quality
customer_reviews.text: Not all home gym products measure up on Amazon, but this stands head and heels above the rest. Super strong, well built, tight fitting and hex head screws, nice touch. Every bit the quality of competing products from Rogue Fitness, but your postman will hate you, the box it comes in is HEAVY and it ships thru the US Mail....
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but too small and can potentially flip
customer_reviews.text: I bought 12x14x16. It is sturdy but is too small for jumping on it. If you have a good balance you can try but I would not recommend for a person with not so good balance. By optimizing to use all three sides it has become too small. You can try raising your body and may use it for dips. I just returned it. I realized that, sometimes, it becomes wobbly if you try raising your body. I feel it is unsafe to use it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kumar

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love this plyo-box! It’s compact but effective for stepovers and movements that don’t require very verticals jumping. You can do vertical jumping BUT if you have large feet or have a little poundage, you may opt for a larger box. Nevertheless, this box is DEFINITELY worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: thatguy2257

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality; easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 16/14/12 version. Easy to assemble (hand screw driver worked fine); very sturdy; great quality. Right now (June 25, 2020) - best price I've seen in months. Definitely worth this cost and would recommend. ** The 16/14/12 version does not come with the interior slats - but they are not needed for this size.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenwoods

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy, easy to move, comes with own tool. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got the 16x14x12 box, very easy to assemble with a mallet (or a small rubber dumbbell if you dont have a mallet lol). Some pieces don't fit exactly so you have to gently pound some pieces together but this holds the pieces in place while you put on the screws. Comes with it's own tool so you do not need to drill the screws in. Tip: lightly screw all screws on one side in with your hand , then tighten all screws. Repeat on all sides.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great plyo box if your not jumping on it
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price and shipping was very fast. The box seems sturdy, but moves around on plank flooring or workout mat, so don't feel safe jumping up on it. Should have bought the next size up for a wider platform also.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Rohde

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the home gym
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for my home gym. I got the 16/20/24” so that both me and my 11 yr old could use it. I’m a heavier guy and the box had no problems holding my weight. It sturdy, heavy and I like that it has internal reinforcement. I got the green non skid version and although the surface feels slick, it grips shoes well.
customer_reviews.author: Primal

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Unstable and unsafe. My husband jumped on it and it slid across the floor. Injured his back. So you can not use it on hard wood floors. And if you jump on it above 12in it tilts and sometimes falls over if feet are not exactly in center. Very useless at that point. Will not be buying from this brand for the others.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great home gym essential.
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this box by my personal trainer for use at home during COVID-19 quarantine. This box is sturdy and compact and made of quality material. The price is right, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Drey

customer_reviews.title: Take Your CrossFit to a New Level
customer_reviews.text: The box is part of my home CrossFit setup. It took about 30 minutes to assemble. The box is solid there is nothing flimsy about it. I’m 6’3, 230 pounds, there is absolutely no give or instability while I’m using it. After two months I have graduated from the 20 inch to the 24 inch side who know Box Jumps were hard.
customer_reviews.author: KDUB2051

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Box I Love It!!! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: The Box Is Very Sturdy And Well Made. The Only Downside Is It Can Be A Little Tricky To Assemble. So What My Husband Did During Assembly Is Leave The Screws Semi Tight That Way If You Need To Make Adjustments During The Assembling You Can. Then Once It Is All Is Fit Together Tighten All The Screws. There’s No Need a To Shave Down Sides Because The Box Is Well Made And The Box Lines Up Perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Box
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice sturdy box for working out. The assembly isn't difficult but there are a lot of screws to put in so it does take some time. Having that many does help in the sturdiness so long term it is worth the extra effort. There are not any no slip pads on this anywhere so make sure to get some kind of mat if you don't already have one because otherwise when you step on the box there is a very good chance it will slide and you will take a fall. It is a bit expensive for what is essentially six pieces of plywood but it does the job so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Get bigger size for better stability....
customer_reviews.text: I got the 12/14/16 version and only when using the 12 inch height is the top surface wide enough to do actual box jumps. At 14 or 16 inch heights it’s ok for step ups, but the top surface at these heights is smaller - meaning the base is also smaller and more wobbly - so doesn’t work for box jumps. For my fitness level this is ok, but if I’d known this I’d have purchased a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bellone

customer_reviews.title: You can jump on this.
customer_reviews.text: You think you wont use your power drill to put this together because you're thinking "how long could it possibly take?" The answer is very long and you should have just used the drill. Anyway, its pretty stable and I like that it has 3 different "heights". I don't like that theres only one set of handle holes.
customer_reviews.author: Niyaz A. Mahmud

customer_reviews.title: as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 2 boxes. easily put together. Just takes about 15-20 minutes to assemble. The only reason it takes so long is you have to use a small allen wrench to tighten the screws. But super simple, and sturdy piece of equipment. Thanks Yess4All
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to assemble. Honestly, I put it off for almost a week because I was dreading having to assemble it, but it was super simple to put together. My son and I have used it a few times already. Feels sturdy, though probably not as sturdy as the foam versions of these boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie & Jason

customer_reviews.title: Ehh, just EHH
customer_reviews.text: Over priced for what it delivers. Bolts, screws, wood, and even the rough service are cheap and I don't expect them to last long. HAving to allen wrench over 30 poorly manufactured screws in took forever!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great box for exercises
customer_reviews.text: I use Fitbit Coach and needed a box for some of the exercises - like elevated pushups. This is perfect and the three different sizes allows me to use the taller sides as I get better.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Great price, sturdy and easy to built.
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy and easy to assemble. Overall just great for home use and my needs. The price is certainly an incentive compared to the more expensive ones at my gym. It’s not as sturdy and heavy as those ones. I put it on top of a foam mat so it’s not sliding around, and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It get's me closer to the size of a vertical step when on the trail. Use a power drill to put it together, it goes so much faster, and you'll love it even more. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect deliver, complete satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: A lil smaller than what I imagined , but worth the price and convenience
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Plyo Box for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Plyo box came with all the necessary pieces and went together in about 10 mins (without a drill). Very sturdy when jumping but wouldn't recommend using on laminate or faux wood flooring without exercise mats because the box will slide slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Cerinavia Fogle

customer_reviews.title: Great box for all kinds of workouts
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time buying this box. I use them for step ups, box jumps and now for lifting blocks as long as I don't slam down the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Fit Hot MEss

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Affordable, and Effective
customer_reviews.text: The box came in great condition with all parts and instructions. Took 10 minutes to assemble and feels very sturdy under a 300 lb frame.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed, difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, what it cost, and what you have to do to put it together, this is a rip off. For the one we got, the internal bracing didn’t line up With the screw holes so I had to completely redesign it so the parts lined up. (My design is better than theirs.) If you have any woodworking skills at all, make your own.
customer_reviews.author: TomInVermont

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Fairly easy to put together and feels very sturdy. I would recommend for home gym enthusiasts. Love the three height options.
customer_reviews.author: Scho

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I love this box! The instructions weren’t very helpful but it was really easy to figure out how to put it together. I put it together fairly quickly and it came with all the hardware needed, Allen wrench and exactly enough screws. I would definitely recommend this box.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: This box is unforgiving but PERFECT.
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this box. It is sleek, functional, and sturdy. Its finish is so pretty, and it was super easy to assemble, which is not to say it is at all flimsy! The only warning i have is to GET YOUR FEET UP! Enjoy the photo of my husband crashing into it. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great product but holes are missing
customer_reviews.text: Bodyboss has box jumps in week 7 so I was so excited to get my plyo box! It was easy to put together and seems sturdy BUT some of the holes weren't drilled so I'm not sure if I feel 100% safe jumping on it and working out with it...
customer_reviews.author: lydia

customer_reviews.title: Great for jump training
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this for jump training for volleyball. Great size and easy to put together, I gave it 4 stars because it would be nice to have a coating on it in case you don't make the jump, you will scrap your skin on the wood
customer_reviews.author: AMBER NASER

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome very study. I've had it a while and abuse it ;)
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good pick
customer_reviews.text: Great box. Easy to assemble and very study. Built in handle holes make it easy to maneuver and can be used for other things.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyInWonderland

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The instructions could have been articulated a little better but overall very easy to put together and works exactly as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Patzkowsky

customer_reviews.title: Super Versatile Product!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended . Very good quality . Thought it was a little wider but the quality of it made me forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: bought the smaller version since prices are so inflated due to COVID panic buys driving up the market. The item arrived earlier than anticipated and had no missing parts/pieces. It holds up well and serves its purpose,
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve needed a step box for a while. After getting this in 12,14,16 I will need to be upgrading so that I can do box jumps. Easy to put together and worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality. I've had no issues and use it several times a week. It was easy to assembly and no doubt will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: brenda spence

customer_reviews.title: don't expect to do box jumps, but otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: Quick to build, slightly less than 100% on the sturdy factor....smaller than I thought it would be (partially my fault), so not really big enough for you to do jumps...good for lunges, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Bostrom

customer_reviews.title: Essential for at home workouts!
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn't come with instructions but there was a YouTube video that helped. I ordered 2, but be aware there was a slight dimension difference, roughly 1/4" when placed side by side.
customer_reviews.author: Sebring Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Assembly challenges but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: first attempt at assembly the pilot hole was small and ended up pushing pieces apart instead of together Later stared at new connection and got it together Better instructions would be helpful. Handle holes not sanded Otherwise a sturdy and heavy box
customer_reviews.author: cwyatt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy beginner box
customer_reviews.text: This plyo box is the smallest size I would recommend. Perfect for anyone starting out or "starting again". The handles make it easy to move and use. It's sturdy and I feel safe on it. It was way to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mireyaville

customer_reviews.title: Assembly required
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had come assembled, but over all it wasn't hard to do myself. Seems sturdy. It was the same brand my gym used.
customer_reviews.author: HCOCHRAN

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This thing is well made, comes with sturdy hardware, and was easy to assemble if you have good common sense. I would definitely buy another if needed. It is a beast.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa T.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together, however...
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together, however was not able to put in one of the screws due to the un-alignment of the screw holes. It also did not come with mid braces that go in the box, it’s hollow.
customer_reviews.author: HK.

customer_reviews.title: Easy for someone who doesn't know anything about carpentry
customer_reviews.text: I've never built anything in my life, but I was able to do this in just a few minutes. Feels super study. Excited to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Claire S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing and unfinished pieces
customer_reviews.text: 6/22/19 Missing a support piece which is pretty important, and as you can see in the picture one of the support pieces are unfinished. I can only assume I got a return. Now I have to send it back which is a hassle because the box is damaged, it’s heavy and I have to lug it to ups. I really don’t know how this got such high reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for box jumps!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for CrossFit at home! This was so easy and fast to assemble and is sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Iove this box. I've used it several times and is wonderful for our home gym.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Took less than 10 minutes to assemble. My teenage son loves it and uses it almost everyday. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria N.

customer_reviews.title: What can I say? it's a good box.
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a pretty good product for the price. Can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: christopher.b.hayes

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different brand!
customer_reviews.text: Wood mites were everywhere when I opened the box. I should have stopped there but I cleaned the pieces but then discovered that the 16" tabs were miscut and would not seat into the 12" box tab slots. The bugs were bad enough but the craftsmanship is inexcusable!
customer_reviews.author: LShep

customer_reviews.title: Love this workout box
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my gym. Very sturdy. Love doing tricep dips on it.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper for life.

customer_reviews.title: Easy build and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t build it but my business partner did and she said it was fairly easy to build and she doesn’t know which end of the screwdriver to use. I would have given it 5 stars but it’s smaller than I thought when I received it. It’s a little unstable when it’s on its highest side for box jumps other then that it’s a very solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter box for my 13 year old! I bought a weighted vest, if you are looking for additional gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Chad E. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected
customer_reviews.text: Have used for a couple weeks and still feel study.
customer_reviews.author: James S Brunett

customer_reviews.title: My thumb is swollen
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the instructions which tell you to piece it together then screw it together you may have a hard time. All holes do not match up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Plyo Box
customer_reviews.text: The box works great on a flat surface. I had it in my head it was a bit bigger than it was so it tends to be a bit unstable if the ground has any undulations in it. Box works great for simple plyo moves. More complicated ones will require a bigger, in overall dimension, box.
customer_reviews.author: A12bee

customer_reviews.title: Soldi Box
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively easy to put together although it did not come with instructions. It is very sturdy and nicely sanded down on all edges. The bracing that's on the inside seems like a nice feature. I've tried it twice in two different workouts doing box jumps and step ups and it seems to work like a champ so far.
customer_reviews.author: mannylv

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together! Comes with an Allen wrench - I’m not handy and it was super easy. Love the box.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good. Can be better.
customer_reviews.text: On the 16" side, it's actually 15.5" so a star off that. The instructions are bare minimum. People can figure it out, but a better writeup would nice.
customer_reviews.author: Fes Naqvi

customer_reviews.title: Great Plyo Box
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner in plyometrics, and I have found this plyo box absolutely terrific! It is VERY sturdy, easy to assemble, and it is the perfect height. I have started doing jump-ups on the sixteen inch side, so I have ample room to grow with the 18 and 20 inch sides. Get this box if you want to do plyo, you will NOT be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Spoula

customer_reviews.title: Attempted to show screw sizes
customer_reviews.text: No instructions, but fairly self explanatory...went together easily. Photos with approximate sizes of my included screws...they were in a little cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great & sturdy for intense workouts
customer_reviews.text: Great & sturdy for intense workouts! Highly recommend. I use my box for days I’m not working out with my trainer and it’s exactly like the one in my gym. Easy to assemble. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jrzygrl

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the quality and ease of build
customer_reviews.text: Solid build and easy to assemble, considering purchasing the next size up as well
customer_reviews.author: EHahn

customer_reviews.title: Unbelivibly Strong
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best designed, sturdiest and cool looking purchases I ever made. Just totally outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I put this together in minutes and it was ready to use. It is sturdy and easy to turn for alternating heights.
customer_reviews.author: tamaral

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is really solid and was really quick and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer garcia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good and tough
customer_reviews.text: Think works great. Gets use pretty much every day. Assembly was pretty easy. Good size and light to carry
customer_reviews.author: john gulley

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I like that it looks like the picture. I am one that doesn’t read the entire description when buying things.. awk but i thought it was going to be bigger than when I assembled it lol. Oops
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Wells

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile!! Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Very versatile! My dad has the larger one and I thought it was so great I ordered one too and use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Veal

customer_reviews.title: Best for youth use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Easy to put together. May be a bit small for adults. Perfect for youth sized feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts - No Response from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Product came missing one screw necessary for assembly and Amazon is not currently taking phone calls, so unclear if or when this issue will be remedied and whether or I will ever be able to use this box, which was not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: DCS12

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Have used it at least 50 times in the last few months and it has held up great! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: FORRESTF

customer_reviews.title: No instructions !
customer_reviews.text: Although this is somewhat self explanatory to put together there were no instructions!! Wood was chipped and two holes had knots so it was impossible to put the screw in.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Jump on this Box deal
customer_reviews.text: Take it from someone who HATES assembling stuff, this was super simple. Very well made and couldn’t be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ben J Zeppa Jr

customer_reviews.title: Goes together easily, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Its exactly what is says, a sturdy exercise box. The internal braces give added rigidity. Goes together with just a few taps and then screws. solid and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Don7A

customer_reviews.title: Small, but nice quality and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Need a rubber mallet to assemble. Use electric drill with torque bit on low setting for fasteners. Tighten all once more at the end. Painted mine with clear paint. For CrossFit folks, note the size! This is small, but still handy. Kind of small for plyometric work (jumping with both feet )
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice box.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, didn’t even need instructions (good, cause it didn’t come with any).. very sturdy, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

product_meta.title: Yes4All Wood Plyo Box/Wooden Plyo Box for Exercise
product_meta.description:
Do you want to recruit more muscles by catching the air? Plyo boxes are hottest tools to make your dream come true! Yes4All Wood Plyo Box is built solidly like a tank, perfect for Crossfit and Plyometric workouts - Get it now to incinerate fat faster!

SOLID WOOD CONSTRUCTION WITH NON-SLIP SURFACE

Built of high-grade plywood with internal bracing (on 3 largest sizes) for maximum strength, Yes4All Wood Plyo Box can increase stability at your chosen heights. With a slip-free top, don’t worry about accidental slips during workout

SANDED EDGES FOR COMFORT AND SAFETY

Unlike other products, this model has the complete sanded sides to make it safer. As you can’t finish a jump since the feet slide down outside the box, the edges are sanded to provide greater comfort

COMES WITH 4 DIFFERENT SIZES (14, 18, 20, 24)

The puzzle box has 4 different sizes available now - 16x14x12”, 20x18x16", 24x20x16", 30x24x20" to save more space at the gym – rotate the box for more challenging heights

ADVANCED DESIGN FOR GREAT STABILITY

The wooden plyo box guarantees you to grow higher strength, agility, and power required in all athletic sports. Its solid and compact structure enables all athletes to do any types of exercises with great stability

PERFECT FOR CROSSFIT, MMA, AND PLYOMETRIC TRAININGS

Yes4All Wood Plyo Box is a great home gym equipment for all of your explosive training programs that require quick and powerful movements such as Plyometric exercises. It’s also great for CrossFit Workouts, MMA, Box-squats, and steps-up

WARRANTY: 1-year warranty and 30-day return (contact seller for more details)
feature_bullets: AVAILABLE IN 20 INCHES – 24x20x16" - Save more space with one box only that can be rotated to vary your desired jump height to 3 height levels
PRO-DUTY WOOD CONSTRUCTION: Goes with internal bracing (on 3 largest sizes) for maximum strength; s for a non-slip surface on the top and to support heavy-weight athletes

IDEAL FOR PLYOMETRIC EXERCISE, CROSSFIT, MMA: Plyometric moves are the ones in which the strength, elasticity, muscle innervations get used to jump higher - throw farther - hit harder. Perfect for step-ups, box squats, CrossFit work and MMA
ADVANCED DESIGN FOR JUMPING: Features pre-drilled holes for quick assembly and rounded corners where you can put maximum efforts without getting hurt. Poly-coated outer layer to protect the exterior

SUITABLE FOR COMMERCIAL & INDIVIDUAL USE: This Box is durable, stable, easy to use & assemble, which is a perfect choice for gym center with numerous users and ideal for you to do jumping exercises at home
Included Components: 1 X Wood Plyometric Box
